Reviews.Title: Pretty much junk.
Reviews.Author: Christopher R. Baldwin
Reviews.Content: the price was relatively cheap for what you get... but what you get is pretty cheap.  The tripod is a joke. i would never put my camera on this thing. The battery, charger, memory card and filters are all ok. The wide angle and telephoto lenses are cheap but usuable. The camera bag is way too small. Not a good purchase. If you're looking for a good accessory kit, than this is not it.

ProductInfo.Features:
32GB SDHC Memory Card + USB SDHC Memory Card Reader
UV, Florescent, Polarizer Filter Kit + 58mm 2x Telephoto lens
58mm Super Wide Angle Lens + Deluxe Camera Bag w/Strap + Full Size Tripod
Extended Life Battery + Ac/Dc Rapid Charger + Zing Micro Fiber Cleaning Cloth + Memory Card Wallet
Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Cleaning Kit + Mini Table Size Tripod
ProductInfo.Name: Canon T4i Accessory Saver Kit (58mm Wide Angle Lens + 58mm 2X Telephoto Lens + 58mm 3 Piece Filter Kit + 32GB SDHC Memory + Extended Life Battery + Ac/Dc Charger + USB Card Reader + Deluxe Camera Case w/Strap + Full Size Tripod + LCD Screen Protectors + Mini Tripod
